author: NBCNews.com
title: New study highlights issues of systemic bias in jury selection
description: Discrimination is illegal, but peremptory challenges allow the prosecution and defense to dismiss potential jurors without cause. A review of appeals in California involving peremptory challenges finds Black jurors are struck more than any other group.
source.name: NBC News

title: United Airlines warns employees of 36,000 possible involuntary furloughs
description: As coronavirus cases surge across the country and travel demand remains low, United Airlines has warned that 36,000 employees may lose their jobs on October 1st as the company seeks to shrink its business and cut costs.

title: U.S. testing system overwhelmed as coronavirus cases rise by 1 million in past month
